title: Curriculum Vitae in the form of a 24MB PDF/ISO hybrid

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content: An engineer created an operating system. He then decided to pack both his curriculum vitae and boot CD inside the same file. You can choose to either open the file as a PDF, or boot it from VirtualBox, or both as you can see on the screenshot below. Cool stuff going on at [http://r.dakko.us/](http://r.dakko.us/ "External link") ![screenshot.png](http://r.dakko.us/screenshot.png) How it was done: [https://gist.github....4ae90fe0ed0e16e](https://gist.github.com/klange/c49d7836a53c922384ae90fe0ed0e16e "External link") Have fun! ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
